question:
You are applying for a job and need a letter of reference.
Write a letter to a former teacher. In your letter:
. Give details of the job
explain why it is important to you
suggest what information your teacher could put in the reference.
text: I am pleased to inform you that I have got a new job offer and I have been asked to produce a letter of reference.
The job is of a software engineer in a multinational company, I have to do the development work on the C language.
Being a code developer in the software industry has been my passion, as you have seen, I had developed my own projects in the college computer lab.

This job matters a lot to me as this will be giving me the base I need for my career. I would like you to write a reference letter in which you could mention my programming skills and innovative ideas, also I will need you to put my general information along with my academic years.
This will help me get a chance to get a good start with my job and will have a good first impression.
Here you could also add my project details where I have developed some working programs, while I was giving my practices last year.
I look forward to seeing you soon with a joining letter in my hand and I am sure you will be very proud of me being your student.
